key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks due to stringent global medical device regulations
Economic sensitivity from reliance on elective dental procedures
Supply chain vulnerabilities from global operations
Intense competition in the dental implant market

social_issues: Focus on ethical business practices and compliance with global ESG trends
governance_issues: Strong corporate governance and emphasis on ethical standards
